title: Govt making efforts to strengthen national institutions: Ali Nawaz Awan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 06 (APP):Special Assistant to the Prime Minister on CDA Ali Nawaz Awan on Monday said the government was making efforts to strengthen national institutions.
Talking to media outside Parliament House, he said the government would revamp the system to bring economic stability in the country.
Talking about Iran-USA, he said Pakistan wanted peace in the region, adding Pakistan had already paid huge price due to Afghan war.
Ali Nawaz Awan said Pakistan would not become part of any war in the region.
Replying to a question regarding gas, he said the authorities concerned were making efforts to manage gas load for consumers.
